00002 #include "SimpIntAPGenerator.h"

00005 #include <iostream>

00010 int SimpIntAPGenerator::ProcessPulses( 
00011           const PulseIslandList& pulseList, AnalysedPulseList& analysedList)
00012 {
00013 
00014   SetBankInfo(pulseList.at(0)->GetBankName());
00015 
00016   double integral, energy;
00017   TAnalysedPulse* outPulse;
00018 
00019   for(PulseIslandList::const_iterator pIt = pulseList.begin(); pIt != pulseList.end(); pIt++)
00020     {
00021       integral = 0;
00022       energy = 0;
00023       std::vector<int> samples = (*pIt)->GetSamples();
00024 
00025       double length = samples.size();
00026       double tempint = 0;
00027       for(std::vector<int>::iterator sIt = samples.begin(); sIt != samples.end(); sIt++)
00028           tempint += *sIt;
00029 
00030       integral = fTriggerPolarity * (tempint - (fPedestal * length));
00031     
00032 
00033       // We will need new calibration parameters from integral method
00034       energy = fECalibSlope* integral + fECalibOffset;
00035   
00036       outPulse=MakeNewTAP(pIt-pulseList.begin());
00037       outPulse->SetIntegral(integral);
00038       outPulse->SetEnergy(energy);
00039       // Add the pulse to the TAP list
00040       analysedList.push_back(outPulse);
00041     }
00042 
00043 
00044         // returning 0 tells the caller that we were successful, return non-zero if not
00045         return 0;
00046 }
00047 
00048 // Similar to the modules, this macro registers the generator with
00049 // MakeAnalysedPulses. The first argument is compulsory and gives the name of
00050 // this generator. All subsequent arguments will be used as names for arguments
00051 // given directly within the modules file.  See the github wiki for more.
00052 //
00053 // NOTE: for TAP generators OMIT the APGenerator part of the class' name
00054 ALCAP_TAP_GENERATOR(SimpInt);
